title: Are the pbe Invites random?
body: So me and 2 of my friends ,applied  for pbe in season 4 , me and 1 of my friend are playing from season 3 . they Got an invitation and i did not and the most bizarre thing its that one of my friend flame every game Afk and kinda troll if he gets angry he gets ban to chat every season at least twice . i Dont do things like that maybe once i got bugsplated in season 5 and than i couldnt reconect but why did he got and invitation and i dont.

replies.body: PBE applications cannot be expedited or guaranteed, but there are some prerequisites like having an account in good standing. Our [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) provides some more information on PBE and admittance.  Best of luck on your application!

Yes, it's random. They may target specific groups to fulfill a testing need (like Taric mains for a Taric rework) and being punished lowers your chances of being picked, but otherwise it's just random.
